imprint.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the mark left by an object being pressed into or onto something
imprint.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the imprint of her hand on the soft sand
imprint.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the name of a publisher as it appears on a book
imprint.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to print or press the mark of an object on something
imprint.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: One snowy morning, footprints and tyre marks were imprinted in the snow.
